Section.Title: Use in Cancer

ItemizedList.ListItem: Acute lymphoblastic leukemia that is Philadelphia chromosome positive. It is used:In children aged 1 year or older with newly-diagnosed cancer. It is used with other chemotherapy drugs.In adults whose disease did not respond to other drugs or who are not able to receive other drugs.

Chronic myelogenous leukemia (CML) that is Philadelphia chromosome positive. It is used:In children aged 1 year or older with chronic phase CML.In adults with chronic phase CML that is newly diagnosed.In adults with chronic phase, accelerated phase, or blastic phase CML who cannot receive other drugs or whose cancer did not respond to other drugs, including imatinib mesylate.

Section.Para: Dasatinib is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.
